data_current_wind.wind_code: grep -A 1 Kierunek\ wiatru | head -n 2 | tail -n 1 | sed -e "s/.*src='\([^']*\).*/http:\/\/www.pogodynka.pl\/\1/" | sed -e "s/.*\/\([^\/]*\).jpg.*/\1/"
data_current_wind.wind_speed: grep -A 1 Sila\ wiatru | head -n 2 | tail -n 1 | sed -e "s/[^<]*<[^>]*>\([^<]*\).*/\1/"
data_current_wind.wind: grep -A 1 Sila\ wiatru | head -n 2 | tail -n 1 | sed -e "s/[^<]*<[^>]*>\([^<]*\).*/\1/"

data_day1.name: grep span\ class=\'godzina\' | head -n 1 | tail -n 1 | sed -e "s/[^<]*<[^>]*>\([^0-9]*\).*/\1/"
data_day1.temperature_high: grep -A 15 1[34]:00 | grep temperatura | head -n 1 | tail -n 1 | sed -e "s/[^<]*<[^>]*>\([^<]*\).*/\1/"
data_day1.icon: grep -A 15 1[34]:00 | grep ico | head -n 1 | tail -n 1 | sed -e "s/[^\.]*img src=\([^>]*\).*/http:\/\/www.pogodynka.pl\1/"
data_day1.icon_code: grep -A 15 1[34]:00 | grep ico | head -n 1 | tail -n 1 | sed -e "s/[^\.]*img src=\([^>]*\).*/http:\/\/www.pogodynka.pl\1/" | sed -e "s/.*\/\([^\/]*\).jpg.*/\1/"
